product_name: The North Face Denali Gloves - Kids'
long_description: Offering warmth for cold-weather fun, the Denali gloves for kids are made with warm fleece and feature textured palms for a nice grip. Polyurethane pads on fingertips and across palms improve grip. Taslan(R) nylon inserts across the knuckles and finger tops add durability. Denali gloves are cut to follow the natural curve of the hand, thus eliminating bulk, improving dexterity and reducing fatigue. Internal elastic at wrists secures fit.
short_description: Offering warmth for cold-weather fun, the Denali gloves for kids are made with warm fleece and feature textured palms for a nice grip.
